com.btmatthews.ldapunit

Class DirectoryServerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.ldapunit.DirectoryServerUtils

  • public final class DirectoryServerUtils
extends Object
    Helper functions to start the in-memory LDAP directory server, load LDAP directory entries from an LDIF files and shut down the in-memory LDAP directory server.
    Since:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

      • startServer

        public static com.unboundid.ldap.listener.InMemoryDirectoryServer startServer(int port,
                                                              String baseDN,
                                                              String authDN,
                                                              String authPassword,
                                                              String ldifFile)
                                                                       throws com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException,
                                                                              IOException
        Create and configure an embedded LDAP directory server, load seed data and start the server.
        Parameters:
        ldifFile - The LDIF resource or file from which LDIF records will be loaded.
        Returns:
        The InMemoryDirectoryServer object.
        Throws:
        com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException - If there was a problem configuring or starting the embedded LDAP directory server.
        IOException - If there was a problem reading the LDIF data.

      • loadData

        public static void loadData(com.unboundid.ldap.listener.InMemoryDirectoryServer server,
            String ldifFile)
                     throws com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException,
                            IOException
        Load LDIF records from a file to seed the LDAP directory.
        Parameters:
        server - The embedded LDAP directory server.
        ldifFile - The LDIF resource or file from which LDIF records will be loaded.
        Throws:
        com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.LDAPException - If there was a problem loading the LDIF records into the LDAP directory.
        IOException - If there was a problem reading the LDIF records from the file.

      • stopServer

        Shutdown the embedded LDAP directory server.
        Parameters:
        server - The embedded LDAP directory server.
